name: Chiroform Standard Treadmill
descr:
Chiroform Standard Treadmill!

Description:
 - Motor(Fancooled): 6HP(Peak) 3HP(Continuous) DC Motor
 - Speed: 1~22 km/hr
 - Incline: 1~20%
 - Display type: STN 8Â´ Colorful High brightness LCD display
 - Displays: TIME, DISTANCE, PULSE, CALORIES, SPEED, INCLINE, LAPS,
 PROGRAM PROFILES, OPERATION INFORMATION
 - One-touch incline buttons: 0.2.5.8.11.14.17.20 degrees
 One-touch speed buttons: 2.5.8.12,15.18.20.22 km/hr
- Workout Programs:
54 programs in total 5 preset programs x (each program with 10 different levels)
 1 Manual program, 2 User programs, 1 HRC programs
 - Body Colors: Gray and Black (can do customized color according to customers requirement)
 - Hear Rate Monitor: Yes, Handle Bar sensors & Polar monitor inside (Optionall)
 If medical heart rate monitoring required, please consult your doctor.

 Other Features:
 - All programs have Warm-up and Cool-Down mode.
 - All user personal information can be set.
 - Program target setting by TIME/DISTANCE/CALORIES
 - Build in MP3 plug in, Build in Fan, Build in Speakers
 - Monitors distance/ speed/ time/ calories/ (hand) pulse
 - Handlebar Heart rate monitoring system
 - HRC system, User personal information and target heart rate can be set
 - Slick metallic grey and black design
 - Large Running Belt
 - Can be moved around easily and stored with in-built castors
 - Foldable with Auto down function
 - Brand new and sealed in box
